entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow at times mixed with rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm over southern sections. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 near the river. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except 60 near the river in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
